modName: Azerra - Mage and Warrior by Den987
descriptionHtml:
============
[color=pink]DESCRIPTION[/color]
============
Born in Solitude, educated fisherman but when war broke out between the Stormcloaks and the Empire, Azerra became a soldier Stormcloaks
She captured the two-handed sword and fire magic, but was injured and sent to Jorvaskr, where she is now.

This mod add Azerra
Marryable , Essential , 1H weapon , Fire Magic , Heavy Armor 
[color=pink]You can find her in Jorrvaskr [/color]
ONLY MANUAL INSTALLATION
I hope you like it

=============
[color=pink]RECOMMENDED[/color]
=============
Realistic Female Face
CBBE

=============
[color=pink]REQUIRED[/color]
=============
Apachii Sky Hair 1.4


=============
[color=pink]INSTALLATION [/color]
=============
Setup all files to your data folder
=============
[color=pink]UNINSTALLATION[/color]
=============
Delete bsa and esp files
_______________________

[color=pink]CREDITS:[/color]
Apachii for Apachii Sky Hair used in this mod
author: Den987
